basic_information.scholarship_name: Samuel Henry and Elizabeth P. Mitchell Foundation Scholarship for Modern Languages

description: This scholarship is awarded to recognize students of the Department of Modern Languages who are accomplished in several languages. Eligibility Requirements Major/minor in language Minimum 3.5 GPA An active learner in more than one language Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
